item.description:
Announcing the kick-off session of the Socialist Party Study Group

please read for discussion:

YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE A SAINT TO BE A SOCIALIST
By Edwin Laing

find it here!
http://www.spboston.o...


Lucy Parsons Center
549 Columbus Avenue
Boston, MA 02118
Sunday, December 5th
5:00PM


From the curious to the committed, all are welcome to attend!!

Our goal is to explore politics, history, economics and the art of organizing with a particular emphasis on (but not limited to) libertarian and revolutionary socialist traditions.

We will survey a wide range of speeches, letters, and essays by history-makers that can be found online. An objective of the study group will be to foster critical thinking, not to develop a narrow political line.

We will initially meet on a monthly basis to discuss a short reading assignment. Everyone will be encouraged to select a reading and lead a discussion session.

If you have any questions or need any special accommodations, please let us know.
item.name: Socialist Party Study Group KICK-OFF!
